# @babel/plugin-transform-block-scoping

> Compile ES2015 block scoping (const and let) to ES5

## Install

Using npm:

```sh
npm install --save-dev @babel/plugin-transform-block-scoping
```

or using yarn:

```sh
yarn add @babel/plugin-transform-block-scoping --dev
```
